name: Life Roots
description:
Clicker game where you make the last trees on earth grow in order to create life.

Tap the roots to extend them, collect ressources to upgrade the stats of the roots and  trees.

The art direction aims to create a fantasy, colored and chill ambiance.


This game was made during the Global Gam Jam 2023, by Team Madeleine composed of :

BARLET Lucas : Producer / Technical Artist

BUISSON Théau : Environment Artist

BORY Kévin : Environment Artist

DESHAYES Jérémy : UI Designer / Environment Artist

DEVILLE Louis : UI Developper / System Developper

DELAROSE Maxime : System Developper / Game Designer

FOREL Mathieu : System Developper / Game Designer

ROUDADOUX Maxence : Game Designer / Sound Designer

Huge thanks to E-ArtSup who hosted during the jam.
